config_description: Replica factor is determined via the replication strategy used by the specified keyspace.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration code checks if initial tokens are specified, if not, it checks for allocationKeyspace. If allocationKeyspace is specified, it uses a token allocation algorithm to generate suitable tokens. If neither initial tokens nor allocationKeyspace is specified, it chooses a random number of tokens.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the 'allocate_tokens_for_keyspace' configuration in the system depends on when the getBootstrapTokens method is called. This method is typically called during bootstrap or when a new node joins the cluster.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'allocate_tokens_for_keyspace' configuration option on the system is significant as it determines the token allocation for new nodes joining the cluster. It affects the distribution of data across the cluster and can impact the performance and load balancing of the system.
